SELECT di.SourceId, di.SourceName, di.Longt, di.Lat, SUM(CASE WHEN hd.Rank='重大隐患' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MajorHidden, SUM(CASE WHEN hd.Rank='一般隐患' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS GeneralHidden, SUM(CASE WHEN ad.AlarmCode IS not NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RiskWarn FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci ON di.CompanyId = ci.CompanyId LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_HIDDEN_DANGER hd ON (di.SourceId= hd.DangerSource AND hd.Rectification='已整改') LEFT JOIN TB_REALTIME_ALARM_DATA ad ON (ad.EquipCode LIKE di.UniqueCode+'%' AND ad.Status='1') WHERE di.SourceId IS NOT NULL
AND ci.CompanyName LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchCompanyName},'%'))
AND di.SourceName LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchSourceName},'%'))
AND di.Rank = #{searchRank}
GROUP BY di.SourceId, di.SourceName, di.Longt, di.Lat

SELECT pu.UnitName,pu.UnitId,
SUM(case WHEN ad.TargetCode='0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS qiti FROM TB_BASE_PROCESS_UNIT pu LEFT JOIN TB_REALTIME_ALARM_DATA ad ON ad.EquipCode LIKE pu.UniqueCode+'%' WHERE pu.SourceId = #{sourceId} GROUP BY pu.UnitName,pu.UnitId
